title: Senior PHP Developer
description:
MINDENTO DOSTARCZA KOMPLETNE NARZĘDZIEM DO ZARZĄDZANIA PROCESEM TRAVEL & EXPENSESpółka jako pierwsza w regionie CEE digitalizuje i automatyzuje proces odbywania podróży służbowych kompleksowo (End2End) wykorzystując AI i jednocześnie motywując pracowników do zmiany zachowania zgodnie z koncepcją sharing Economy. Obecnie Mindento jest na ścieżce bardzo dynamicznego wzrostu klientów w kraju jak również zagranicą. Zatem, Deweloperze PHP, dołącz do nas i pomóż nam rozwijać naszą przełomową dla branży technologię.CZYM BĘDZIESZ SIĘ ZAJMOWAĆ
nowe projekty strategiczne dla firmy Fintech/OpenBanking API i wdrażanie ChatGPT

wdrażanie rozwiązań Machine Learning dla rekomendacji zakupowych własnego marketplace
utrzymanie i rozwój naszych aplikacji opartych o framework Laravel i Symfony,
czynny udział w projektowaniu architektury naszych systemów,
integracja z systemami zewnętrznych dostawców,
współpracą z zespołem frontend i backend developerów, testerów i designerów,
współpracą z naszymi polskimi i międzynarodowymi klientami i partnerami na poziomie dokumentacji technicznej.
STACK TECHNOLOGICZNY PROJEKTÓW

Backend: PHP 7.4/8.1 + Laravel (2 aplikacje),Symfony (nowy projekt) node.js (1 aplikacja), MariaDB, Redis, ElasticSearch, Codeception

Frontend: ReactJS, jQuery, npm, yarn, webpack

System kontroli wersji: Git

Continious Integration: GitLab CI

Zarządzanie logami: Graylog, New Relic, blacfire

Maszyny developerskie: Linux, Docker, PhpStorm
CZEGO OCZEKUJEMY
Bardzo dobrej znajomości PHP 8+
Umiejętności stosowania wzorców projektowych oraz dobrych praktyk tworzenia oprogramowania
Znajomość architektury Hexagonalnej (Ports & Adapters) oraz podejścia framework agnostic
Doświadczenie w pisaniu testów jednostkowych, integracyjnych (mile widziana znajomość podejść TDD, ObjectMother oraz Detroit School)
Bardzo dobrej znajomości baz danych SQL (MariaDB)
Wiedzy z zakresu integracji systemów w oparciu o SOAP, REST
Znajomości zagadnień architektury mikroserwisowej i komunikacji asynchronicznej
Doświadczenie w pracy z Redis, Elasticsearch, Docker
 MILE WIDZIANE
znajomość React.js lub innego frameworka SPA (nie musisz tego znać – mamy w zespole dedykowanego frontendowca ;))
podstawy node.js
podstawy DevOps
ZAPEWNIAMY:
pracę nad własnym produktem
urlop 26dni
pracę w pełnym wymiarze godzin z elastycznym harmonogramem
możliwość pracy zdalnej
różnorodność wyzwań
brak biurokracji
pakiet medyczny
pakiet sportowy
bonus finansowy za planową realizację prac
bonus urlopowy za zatrudnienie osoby rekomendowanej
nie zamykamy się na kandydatów spoza widełek

title: Senior Software Engineer with Node.js focus
description:
Industry: Media streamingWork model: 100% remote (we are looking for people from all over the EU)Contract: B2B Contract’s length: 12 months + extensionsProject language: EnglishEquipment: BYODStart: ASAP PROJECT: We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer that has experience with backend development.You will work in an autonomous, purpose driven team and take an important role in shipping new features while continuously increasing efficiency, stability and scalability of the systems.You will be working in a multi-disciplinary environment with agile principles. SKILLS / MUST HAVE:
Node.js,
TypeScript,

AWS or GCP/Azure Cloud.
OUR CULTURE:
Culture is our number one priority as a company. We believe that people come first and we work every day to enable autonomy, continuous improvement and bring out the best in people. We operate globally and have remote teams, so it is even more important that we strive for an open, inclusive and caring environment where everyone feels visible and welcome. We see ourselves as a modern organisation driven by strong values to create the best, most rewarding and nurturing culture.
We are committed to creating a diverse environment and pride ourselves on being an equal opportunities employer. All qualified candidates will be considered for employment without regard to race, gender, sexual orientation, religion, ethnicity, national origin or any of the other great qualities that set us apart.
 NEXT STEPS: 1.    Interview with our Recruiter on MS Teams. 2.     One more technical interview with the Client aaaand feedback :)  WE OFFER:
Challenging international projects. 
Transparently built relations based on trust and fair play. 
Co-financed benefits: Medicover card, Multisport card and training package.
Possibility to change the career path across the organisation.  
Stable employment in a very firm business area.

title: React Native Developer
description:
As a Miquido team, we assist and support our current clients in their recruitment processes. So we are currently recruiting for one of our good clients located in the UK.What is noteworthy is that this is a client-side role, the hiring is also directly to the client. Below you can find detailed information about the project:The project is an educational app for native and proficient English speakers that teaches you how to express yourself more confidently both at work and in your day-to-day life.Tech:
Backend node JS (Mobile + custom CMS)
React JS (Custom CMS)
React Native (Mobile)
GenAI.
You can be the perfect match for us, if you have:- knowledge of animations as the app is full of gestures (reanimated) and- React-native- React- GraphQL- Typescript- REST- Reanimated 2 lub 3- React Native Gesture HandlerIt can be love at first sight if you also have:- URQL- Zustand- Experience of releasing on apple/google app storeWe value your trust in providing us your data, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. Below you will find the necessary information about the data we collect and process when you send us your CV.The controller of your personal data is Miquido Spółka z ograniczoną odpowiedzialnością sp. k. with its seat in Krakow, Zabłocie 43a, 30-701 Kraków, Poland (“Miquido”, “We”, “Our” or “Us”).

title: Firmware Engineer
description:
Industry: GamingRemote work: 100%Remuneration: (up to 142 PLN/h net + VAT or up to 32 EUR/h net+ vat depends on experience)Assignment type: B2B Project length:  Long-term cooperationProject language: EnglishDESCRIPTION:We are seeking a Firmware Engineer to join the Engineering team. The ideal candidate will have experience working on firmware projects for consumer products specifically related to HID-type devices like mice, keyboards, and headsets.RESPONSIBILITIES:
Writing, improving, and designing product firmware for gaming peripherals.
Candidate should have a solid understanding of developing firmware around high performance products. It is not enough to simply know how to write firmware for mice and keyboards: candidate should also know how firmware optimization relates to the high performing standards for gaming products.
Low latency, sensor performance, interference management are a few examples of concepts that should be understood.
Working with the Engineering team to write protocols that will integrate and interface with our gaming software suite.
Understanding and troubleshooting existing firmware source to help optimize and resolve ongoing bugs.
Ability to build new and innovating features for existing products.
REQUIREMENTS:
Full professional proficiency in English 

Ability to overlap with CST business hours (core hours 15:00 - 18:00)


3-4 years of experience in firmware development and embedded IC development
Knowledge of ICs must include Wireless Nordic Chipsets, STM32, and ICs with similar architecture

Strong C/C++ programming skills

Experience in backend development for desktop software is preferred
A general understanding of the functionality of gaming products and how software/firmware relates to/improves/changes their performance
WE OFFER: 
Challenging international projects. 
Stable employment in a long-term partnership.
Transparently built relations based on trust and fair play.
Co-financed benefits: Medicover card, Multisport card.

title: Senior Backend Developer
description:
Founded in 2021, we are a Polish startup operating within the Żabka Group. We operate in the e-commerce industry, which is one of the fastest-growing sectors globally.So far, we have created two products in the Polish market. Jush, an app which allows you to order your favorite products and have them delivered in as little as 15 minutes from placing your order, and delio, available as an app and also in a browser version, an online supermarket with everything you need for yourself and your home. At Lite e-Commerce, we create cutting-edge technologies that will make your life easier.We are currently looking for a Senior Backend Developer, who will become Lite’s hero or heroine in the mission of technological development of the world!🦸💙🎯 Responsibilities:
Shape the future of our backend ecosystem by designing and implementing complex, scalable microservices using Node.js.
Handle the exponentially growing traffic to our platform, ensuring system scalability and performance.
Be a part of the new trend of q-commerce, applying your knowledge and experience in building large-scale, complex IT solutions.
Optimize and automate processes wherever possible, always striving for efficiency and quality.
Grow with the agile team – together tackling challenging problems with innovative solutions.
Depending on company’s growth and your personal development, there may be opportunities for you to lead a specialized team.
✅ Must Have:

5+ years of professional experience in a similar position, with a background in backend development using Node.js.
Proficiency in modern software development, including NodeJS, GraphQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, Docker, and Git, along with expertise in TypeScript.
Comfortable with microservice architecture, with a track record of designing and implementing services using this architecture.
A solid understanding of the performance implications and scalability of code, with experience in ensuring the scalability and performance of large, complex systems.
A commitment to writing high-quality tests with a focus on quality over quantity, following a TDD or BDD approach;
A proactive approach to solving problems, taking ownership of issues and working towards solutions.
Excellent communication skills, and eagerness to discuss and impact decisions, demonstrating and the capacity to work effectively in multifunctional teams.
Comfortable with integrating different solutions, showing flexibility and adaptability.
Not afraid of new technologies nor responsibilities, demonstrating a willingness to learn and adapt.
Excellent command of Polish and English, both written and spoken, necessary for communication in an international team environment.
🎁 We provide:
Salary depending on experience: 24 000 PLN - 28 000 PLN net.

No fixed working hours (except calls and stand-up).
90% of the work is now feature and 10% of the work is maintenance/bug fixing.
Work 100% remotely, with the option to visit us at our Warsaw office.
B2B contract.
Dynamic environment;
Subsidised MultiSport card, Lux Med medical care, and Uniqa insurance.
Opportunity to participate in an innovative project and transformation of the retail area in Poland.
Equipment and tools necessary for work.
🙌 And besides:
Working with experts from top grocery chains, e-commerce and technology companies 🌐
Great and friendly atmosphere 🫂
A helping hand in every situation 🤝💙
No formal dress code 💼🚫
New, cosy office in the very heart of Warsaw 📍🏢
Check out our recruitment process:📩 You send us your CV, and we carefully review the documents you provide.📲 If you meet our requirements, we will invite you to the first interview – a telephone conversation with Maja, our HR Generalist.💻 In the next step you will have an online interview with Kamil, our Head of Platform Engineering, and Pavlo, our Senior Backend Developer.👉The final step will be an online interview with Alex, our CTO.🎉 If all goes well - welcome aboard Lite e-Commerce!
